title: Godslayer

params.attack: An attack level so high nothing could ever survive

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> If your target is God (NC), or God (NK), they die. No immunities could ever protect against the attack this role does.

> If your target is not God (NC), or God (NK), you will have a relaxing evening with them. They will tell you one other person who is not God.

> You cannot be affected by anything God does.

desc:
Post 1956
*Finally, the counter to the role that will definitely never spawn exists.*
